EmailTemplate.subject: Nice to meet you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome to your clean
energy future
Learn more
Thanks for signing up for a BlueWave Community Solar share{!CASE(Opportunity.Partner_Account__c,'','','BlueWave Inside Sales','',' with '+ Opportunity.Partner_Account__c)}! Because of you, we're one step closer to achieving a cleaner energy future.
What to expect next
1. We match you with a local solar farm We find a farm and assign you a share based on our energy needs. Think farm share, but for solar instead of veggies.
2. Your solar farm gets up and running This could take a while depending on the construction status of your farm. {!IF(Opportunity.UCB__c,"We'll notify you when your farm is fully constructed and connected to the grid.","In the next day or so you'll receive a link to your BlueWave portal, allowing you to see the status of your farm.")}
3. You start receiving savings Once your solar farm is complete, your share generates energy and feeds it into the grid, resulting in a "credit" on your utility bill. You'll continue to receive your utility bill as usual, however the "credit" amount will lower what you owe your utility. {!IF(Opportunity.UCB__c,'','A few months later, you will receive a bill from us for the credit amount at a ' + TEXT(Opportunity.Discount__c*100) + '% discount, reducing your total energy cost.')}
Thanks again for joining the clean energy movement, we're happy you're here. As part of our commitment to you, we'd love to hear about your sign-up experience. Please take our 3-minute survey by clicking the link below:
Complete the survey
